newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Smith Barney ups telecom targets.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Smith Barney ups telecom targets.

text.p: Smith Barney raised the 18-month price targets on Lucent Technologies Inc to $86 from $62 and Motorola Inc to $120 from $94.
-- Additional details were not immediately available.
-- Lucent gained 2/16 to 72-5/16 and Motorola rose 2-11/16 to 74-1/4.
